author: Carlogee_tk
text: Silence is not golden. It is wrapped around fear if not support.

author: Carlogee_tk
text: Its so easy to take from those with a little.

author: Carlogee_tk
text: Red and white roses are beautiful individually and even more together. Human beings regardless of colour are the same. A blue can loose a liver and get one from a green. They are the same.

author: Carlogee_tk
text: The body shells are coloured differently but those of the same spicies are....just the same species.

author: Carlogee_tk
text: The soul has no colour, no race, no class...its a soul.
